head.title: A Further Caution About Electrical Wiring

hedline.hl1: A Further Caution About Electrical Wiring

abstract.p: International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers Local 3 member Peter McNally letter corrects July 2 diagram for wiring duplex electrical receptacle (S)

block.p: The wiring diagram of the duplex receptacle [''Electrical Grounding: How to Make Sure It's Done Right,'' July 2] shows the black hot wire connected to the neutral side of the receptacle and the white neutral wire connected to the hot side of the receptacle. This causes reverse polarity, which can lead to damage to electronic equipment like computers and stereo systems, and even personal injury.
PETER MC NALLY International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, Local 3 New York City
